descriptor.name: Coconut Milk Conditioner
descriptor.short_desc:
Regular use of coconut milk conditioner helps lessen hair fall, and soften hair strands. It also minimizes roughness, dullness and frizz to leave your tresses sleek, strong and glossy. It helps nourish hair roots and shafts. Hydrolyzed Keratin Protein helps repair and thicken hair strands. Help reduce hair fall. Coconut milk conditioner helps your hair combs more easily, frizzes less, tangles less, and breaks less too.

Coconut milk conditioner by WOW Skin Science has been enriched with Coconut Milk Extract and two powerful natural ingredients - Nettle Leaf Extract & Saw Palmetto Extract to provide intensive nourishment to hair roots and shafts while checking hair loss. It has been formulated to help revitalize rough, dry, frizzy, tangling, and falling hair. Suits all hair types.
descriptor.long_desc:
Regular use of coconut milk conditioner helps lessen hair fall, and soften hair strands. It also minimizes roughness, dullness and frizz to leave your tresses sleek, strong and glossy. It helps nourish hair roots and shafts. Hydrolyzed Keratin Protein helps repair and thicken hair strands. Help reduce hair fall. Coconut milk conditioner helps your hair combs more easily, frizzes less, tangles less, and breaks less too.

Coconut milk conditioner by WOW Skin Science has been enriched with Coconut Milk Extract and two powerful natural ingredients - Nettle Leaf Extract & Saw Palmetto Extract to provide intensive nourishment to hair roots and shafts while checking hair loss. It has been formulated to help revitalize rough, dry, frizzy, tangling, and falling hair. Suits all hair types.

descriptor.name: Coconut Milk Moisturizing Handwash - 500 ml
descriptor.short_desc: Coconut handwash keep your hands clean, soft, and hygienic. It is sulphate-free handwash is made with natural ingredients like coconut milk extract, pro-vitamin B5, citric acid and vitamin E. Coconut milk helps to keep the skin soft and prevent chapping. Pro-vitamin B5 helps to repair and refreshes skin.
descriptor.long_desc: Coconut handwash keep your hands clean, soft, and hygienic. It is sulphate-free handwash is made with natural ingredients like coconut milk extract, pro-vitamin B5, citric acid and vitamin E. Coconut milk helps to keep the skin soft and prevent chapping. Pro-vitamin B5 helps to repair and refreshes skin.

descriptor.name: Vegetarian Milk Thistle Capsules 600mg - 60 Capsules
descriptor.short_desc: Milk thistle capsules provides you with a potent dose of antioxidant which helps in improving your wellbeing. Milk thistle, which is from the daisy family of plants, is a source of natural Silymarin. It is a potent flavonoid antioxidant that neutralizes free radicals. It has been traditionally used to lower cholesterol levels. Milk thistle capsules can be taken to help support liver and skin health.
descriptor.long_desc: Milk thistle capsules provides you with a potent dose of antioxidant which helps in improving your wellbeing. Milk thistle, which is from the daisy family of plants, is a source of natural Silymarin. It is a potent flavonoid antioxidant that neutralizes free radicals. It has been traditionally used to lower cholesterol levels. Milk thistle capsules can be taken to help support liver and skin health.

descriptor.name: Glutathione with Milk Thistle Extract 500 mg - 30 Vegetarian Capsules
descriptor.short_desc: Glutathione capsules can help fulfill your body’s Glutathione needs for better health. Milk Thistle also supports liver and kidney health. Glutathione is a powerhouse antioxidant molecule made up of three essential amino acids – L-Cysteine, L-Glutamic Acid & Glycine – vital for numerous body functions including immunity, free radical neutralization and detoxification leading to improved immunity, clearer complexion and better liver health. WOW Life Science Glutathione capsules is natural, vegetarian, gluten-free & stearate-free.
descriptor.long_desc: Glutathione capsules can help fulfill your body’s Glutathione needs for better health. Milk Thistle also supports liver and kidney health. Glutathione is a powerhouse antioxidant molecule made up of three essential amino acids – L-Cysteine, L-Glutamic Acid & Glycine – vital for numerous body functions including immunity, free radical neutralization and detoxification leading to improved immunity, clearer complexion and better liver health. WOW Life Science Glutathione capsules is natural, vegetarian, gluten-free & stearate-free.
